Battle of the Butterflies () is a 1924 German silent drama film directed by Franz Eckstein and starring Asta Nielsen, Reinhold Sch√ºnzel and Hans Brausewetter. It is based on a play by Hermann Sudermann. It was shot at the National Studios in Berlin.
